description:
Supernova Volume Lip Gloss - N 06 delivers extraordinary shine and fullness to your lips with its innovative volumizing formula. This premium lip gloss creates a plumping effect that transforms your pout instantly, giving you that coveted fuller lip look without any invasive procedures. 💋

Exceptional Features of Supernova Volume Lip Gloss

The Supernova Volume Lip Gloss - N 06 stands out with its lightweight, non-sticky texture that glides smoothly across your lips. The formula is enriched with moisturizing ingredients that keep your lips hydrated throughout the day while providing that gorgeous glossy finish. The shade N 06 offers a versatile color that complements various skin tones and makeup looks. Check out our fragrance collection to find the perfect scent to pair with your makeup look.

Product Information

Size Standard Size (5ml)
Color N 06 - Subtle Pink with Shimmer
Material Hypoallergenic Formula
Brand Name Topface

Key Benefits of Supernova Volume Lip Gloss

  • Instant volumizing effect that makes lips appear fuller 👄
  • Long-lasting shine without the sticky feeling
  • Hydrating formula that prevents dry, cracked lips
  • Versatile shade that works for both day and night looks
  • Convenient applicator for precise application

The Supernova Volume Lip Gloss is perfect for those who want to achieve that plump lip look without invasive procedures. Its formula contains special ingredients that create a subtle tingling sensation, increasing blood flow to the lips and creating a natural plumping effect. For a complete makeup look, explore our makeup collection for complementary products.

How to Apply for Maximum Volume

For best results, apply a thin layer of the Supernova Volume Lip Gloss - N 06 to clean, dry lips. For extra definition, outline your lips with a matching lip liner first, then fill in with the gloss. The applicator is designed to provide precise application, allowing you to target specific areas for added volume. You can wear it alone for a natural look or layer it over your favorite lipstick for added dimension and shine. ✨

Looking for more lip products? Check out our lip collection for a variety of options to enhance your pout.

Frequently Asked Question

How long does the plumping effect of Supernova Volume Lip Gloss last?
The volumizing effect of the Supernova Volume Lip Gloss - N 06 typically lasts for 3-4 hours after application. For prolonged results, you can reapply throughout the day as needed. The hydrating benefits continue even after the plumping effect has subsided, keeping your lips soft and moisturized.

Complete your beauty routine with our international fragrance collection to leave a lasting impression wherever you go.
